module Graphics.Rendering.OpenGL.Raw.EXT.TextureEnvCombine (
   -- * Tokens
   gl_COMBINE,
   gl_COMBINE_RGB,
   gl_COMBINE_ALPHA,
   gl_SOURCE0_RGB,
   gl_SOURCE1_RGB,
   gl_SOURCE2_RGB,
   gl_SOURCE0_ALPHA,
   gl_SOURCE1_ALPHA,
   gl_SOURCE2_ALPHA,
   gl_OPERAND0_RGB,
   gl_OPERAND1_RGB,
   gl_OPERAND2_RGB,
   gl_OPERAND0_ALPHA,
   gl_OPERAND1_ALPHA,
   gl_OPERAND2_ALPHA,
   gl_RGB_SCALE,
   gl_ADD_SIGNED,
   gl_INTERPOLATE,
   gl_CONSTANT,
   gl_PRIMARY_COLOR,
   gl_PREVIOUS
) where

import Graphics.Rendering.OpenGL.Raw.ARB.Compatibility
